scripts.build:css: echo ':: Story Stylesheet [stylesheet]' > special/styles.tw && lessc ./styles/main.less >> special/styles.tw
scripts.build:js: echo ':: Story JavaScript [script]' > special/scripts.tw && esbuild scripts/main.ts --bundle --outfile=special/temp.js --platform=browser && cat special/temp.js >> special/scripts.tw && rm special/temp.js
scripts.dev: concurrently 'npm run watch:tweego' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run serve'
